pr_title: Distinguish between simple matches with and without the terms index

timeline.message: Distinguish between simple matches with and without the terms index
test should use text field, not long...
sigterms test should not try and use sigtext agg because it indexes longs

timeline.bodyText: don't we lose coverage with these changes?
timeline.author: javanna

replies.bodyText: Hm, you're right, I had thought this was just testing a useless agg but actually I should change it instead to also have some text and to run the sigText agg over the text field instead.
replies.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: This seems to have slipped when I double checked all the mappers, maybe it does not have a test so we don't enforce its consistency.
timeline.author: javanna

replies.bodyText: Yes, there's no test for VersionFieldMapper - I'll add one as a follow up.
replies.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: should it be return ft.getTextSearchInfo != NONE && gt.getTextSearchIngo != SIMPLE_MATCH_WITHOUT_TERMS ?
timeline.author: javanna

timeline.message:
Revert "sigterms test should not try and use sigtext agg because it indexes longs"

This reverts commit 807bae1c7942cdeb8dfc1ab9099a25cdf840a249.
keep test coverage; simplify support test
